Home Libraries People FAQ More
static_buffer::clear

Clear the readable and writable bytes to zero.

Synopsis 
void
clear();
Description

This function causes the readable and writable bytes to become empty. The capacity is not changed. Buffer sequences previously obtained using data or prepare become invalid.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
